name: generate_metadata
description: Generates metadata for an image: caption, description, asset title, keywords, and alt text.

caption.description: Short description of the image, capturing its main elements in one sentence.

longcaption.description: A relevant description specific to the image, elaborating on its content, context, and notable features.

assettitle.description: A concise title suitable for social media or gallery display.

keywords.description: A comma separated list of relevant search keywords associated with the image. Avoid using generic keywords like 'human', 'person', 'animal', 'object', etc. Do not use existing keywords given in the query.

alttext.description: A description of the image suitable for screen readers or other assistive technologies.
